name: Play the Diabell
text: If a Spell/Trap(s) is sent to the GY to activate a card or effect: Send 1 Illusion or Spellcaster monster from your hand, Deck, or Extra Deck to the GY. During your Main Phase: You can banish 3 Spells/Traps from your GY, including this card; Special Summon 1 "Diabell" monster from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Play the Diabell" once per turn.
